author: NotSoSuper
TrustyJAID
description: Some working, some not working NotSoBot commands
install_msg: This cog contains a data folder for fonts and will save and delete some files locally. Please, read the README.md (https://github.com/TrustyJAID/Trusty-cogs/tree/master/notsobot) for instructions on how and what to install. `sudo apt-get install libmagickwand-dev libaa1-dev ffmpeg` and install all other requirements. Note some commands may be hidden if AALIB is not installed and AALIB will not work on Macs.
name: NotSoBot
